mdRecord.dcterms:description: There are two copies of this black and white photograph. This one shows considerable damage with scratches on the image and a torn corner. The other copy of this photograph identifies the subject as Harry L. Walker. The handwritten notes on the back of this one are as follows, "Mr. H. L. Walker, #1, Lexington, Mr. C. W. Walker, Lexington, Va., Blandome, Mr. H. L. Walker."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harry L. Walker, Blandome (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Portraits
Walker, Harry Lee
